title: "Much Like Your Drama Teacher" - Breaking Down Role-Playing Roadblocks
itunes:title: "Much Like Your Drama Teacher" - Breaking Down Role-Playing Roadblocks
description:
Role-playing tips and tricks from your friendly neighbourhood Halflings, who also happen to be real-life actors. This week we’re using our experience to help break down your role-playing roadblocks with some super easy advice on how you can use your voice and physicality to add characterisation, differentiate between NPC's or evoke different character traits within your game.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
